doc.title: 5 Days in July
doc.plot: Using film footage from television, government, and private archives, Podemski and Schultz convey the essential facts of Newark's 1967 race riots. Originally conceived as a two-screen projection for exhibitions, this experimental documentary can also be viewed as a dual screen video on a single screen.
